numbered_ace_sentences: 3. In every listed league except baseball, more than 60 percent of all players are players of color.
4. No league has a majority of coaches that are people of color.
5. I wonder whether racism is a reason for the low number of coaches of color.
6. Racism has a long history in this country.
7. It is possible that racism causes that coaches of color are not hired.
8. This situation has a negative impact on the greater community.
9. People of color see other people of color succeeding in sports.
10. People of color do not see many people of color as head coaches.
11. A head coach can be an idol.
12. If a person cannot relate to an idol, then the person is less likely to want to be a head coach.
13. The title is: "Coaches of Color Are Hired at Far Lower Rates than White Coaches".
